Description:
This project reveals to the player additions and extensions story told in the " Renaissance " and " hordes of undead " on fully recycled maps.
Ã‚Â«Disciples III: Rebirth " - a beautiful fantasy world inhabited by terrible monsters and brave heroes . Without departing from the canons of turn-based strategy game brings many innovations to the genre , making it possible to feel the real leader of magical armies.
In Ã‚Â«Disciples III: Rebirth " will be available four player races : Empire , Horde Undead Legions of the Damned and the Elven Alliance . Each of them has its own heroes and characters , whether warriors or mages , as well as the original tree structures. Fully three-dimensional game : Instead of static pictures detalizovannye offers 3D models of cities and warriors. Menu construction has also changed . When selecting the building displays a list of its improvements , determining the development path of the warrior . Besides all this , players will be brought to an entirely new combat system .
VirtualDream own graphics engine supports all the latest technology: vertex and pixel shaders , normal maps , skeletal, morfichnuyu and procedural animation, particle system , dynamic lighting and shadows , portal technology , post-processing images, and more .
